amendment.description: Amendments reduce the appropriation for the U.S. Transportation Command by $35 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make the following reductions to the appropriations for Operations and maintenance: Army, $12,950,000; Navy, $3,500,000; Marine Corps, $1,750,000; Air Force, $7,700,000; Defense-wide, $9,100,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Furse amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
